DOC.brief_title: Disease Risk Reduction Omega-3 Rich Rainbow Trout ( Fish Health )
DOC.criteria: BMI 30 39.9 kg/m2 Meet 3 5 following : 1 . Abdominal circumference : men > 102 cm , woman > 88 cm 2 . Triglycerides ≥ 150 mg/dL 3 . HDL cholesterol : men < 40 mg/dL , woman < 50 mg/dL 4 . Blood pressure ≥ 130/85 mm Hg 5 . Fasting glucose ≥ 100 mg/dL Are allergic fish Blood pressure > 160/99 mm Hg Blood glucose ≥ 126 mg/dL Use tobacco product nicotine form include snuff , pill , patch , ecigarettes past 6 month Have establish cardiovascular , pulmonary , and/or metabolic disease diabetes Have uncontrolled high blood pressure Have alcohol , anabolic steroid , substance abuse issue Consume 3 alcoholic drinks/week Have cancer Are pregnant nurse Take nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug aspirin , ibuprofen Aleve , lipid modify drug statin , take medication blood glucose insulin metformin
